name: Loan Shark
description:
This game was created by :

MUSIC: https://brunotorrano.itch.io/

ART: https://kevoevoevo.itch.io/

CODE: https://dreamnskull.itch.io/

This game was made for Juice Jam II and was made entirely in 9 days. This game was created following the theme Paying The Price. Almost all the assets, code and music were created from scratch.
